code: @Test public void closeNonClosableContext() {     ApplicationContext mock = mock(ApplicationContext.class).     ApplicationContextTestUtils.closeAll(mock). }

@Test public void closeContextAndParent() {     ConfigurableApplicationContext mock = mock(ConfigurableApplicationContext.class).     ConfigurableApplicationContext parent = mock(ConfigurableApplicationContext.class).     given(mock.getParent()).willReturn(parent).     given(parent.getParent()).willReturn(null).     ApplicationContextTestUtils.closeAll(mock).     verify(mock).getParent().     verify(mock).close().     verify(parent).getParent().     verify(parent).close(). }
